Articles.Content:
Hi there. I\'m SketchpadGamer, named as such for constantly planning my actions in video games in a little sketchpad.

(^--^)

I quickly became interested in KSP when one of my favourite youtubers posted a video five days ago. He sucks. It was so hilarious though so I grabbed the demo. In this time I\'ve played the demo constantly and still managed to watch ~100 KSP videos on youtube. I decided to make a forum account because as I type this, the full version is downloading. Forever.

(-__-)

Any Spaceplane tips?

(^--^)

Welcome to the forums!

I too, like you, enjoy scribbling concept ideas in my school rough-book. For the spaceplane; ASAS + Control surfaces = Win

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Greetings mate!

My number 83 spaceplane tip is to do things in stages and keep the burney thrusty end behind the pointy forwardy end.
